headline: Fidelity National Information Services (FIS) Announces its New Bank Modernization Framework
summary: ​Fidelity National Information Services, Inc. (NYSE:FIS) is one of the Tech Stocks to Buy with the Lowest P/E Ratios. On September 17, Fidelity National Information Services, Inc. (NYSE:FIS) announced its new Bank Modernization Framework. The framework is aimed at helping banks modernize their entire technology ecosystem. ​Management noted that this will allow banks to start […]
